body: Development of software for devices including smart phones, tablets, handheld units, and other general purpose computing platforms.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC221 ; CMPSC311 or CMPSC312 ; CMPSC462 or CMPSC465)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: CMPSC 475: Applications Programming
